name: Jmatch
tagline: A Java library for variable pattern matching with Strings
body:
JMatch ====== JMatch is a library that allows for variable pattern matching of Strings in Java. Variable pattern matching defines patterns such as:
`"xyyx"` This pattern does not restrict what `"x"` and `"y"` can be but instead defines a relation between the two variables. For example, `"dogcatcatdog"` would be a valid match to the above pattern with the assignments:
`"x" = "dog"`
`"y" = "cat"`
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
